name: The Big Sting
description: Iotian mobsters have pulled off the heist of the century, and now it's up to their victims to get their money back. Join the galaxy's slickest investigators in the race to reclaim their clients' dough!
rules:
-- Choose which faction to support in this event! Unique Bajoran, Maquis, and Romulan missions are available during the event. Get Transmissions from Faction Centers to start them.
-- Using any version of Picard, Kirk, Kira, or Data will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Picard, Kirk, Kira, or Data
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Faction Missions!

featured_crew.name: Booker
featured_crew.flavor: Booker is a courier who makes deliveries and smuggling goods in order to get enough dilithium to keep going with his queen, Grudge.

featured_crew.name: Picard
featured_crew.flavor: In his spare time, Picard enjoyed participating in the Dixon Hill collection of holonovels."

featured_crew.name: Anastasia
featured_crew.flavor: After a transporter accident, Kira's image is used by a holosuite program to display a Soviet secret agent.

screens.text: "I don't know how they pulled it off, but the Iotians just robbed the Bank of Bolias and the bank's clients want their money back--now. The Bajorans hired me to negotiate with the thieves, but apparently I'm not the only pair of eyes on this case..."

"I've met these Iotians. They're not the talking type. Negotiate all you want, but I'll be getting the Maquis' money back by beating these thieves at their own game. After all, it's not stealing to take back something that wasn't theirs in the first place, is it?"

"These negotiations and knockovers sound most entertaining, but I have a job to do. A colonel never disappoints her superiors--especially not the Romulan ones. I will get their money back no matter how many of these gangsters' arms I have to twist to find it."
